titleStmt.title: Hierusalem bedewed with teares. A sermon preached at St. Mary Woolnoth London, upon the fast-day, Martii, 30. 1642. By John Pigott Curate of S. Sepulchers.
titleStmt.author: Pigot, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Griffin, and are to be sold by Iohn Wright in the old Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
